title: Sweet Corn ðŸŒ½ Puff || Indian Style
content:
Puffs can be prepared with any kind of curry. It can be mix Veg/ potato stuffing/ sweet corn stuffing with spices. I Used ready made puff pastry sheets in my recipe which will available in stores. Today I prepared mint flavored sweet corn,carrots and capsicum stuffing for puffs Servings : 4 Duration: 45 mins Ingredients: Sweet Corn ðŸŒ½Â - 1/2 cup Carrot - finely chopped - 2 tb sp Capsicum/ Green Bell pepper - 3 tb sp - finely chopped Mint leaves - one cup - chopped Red chilli Powder - 1 tsp Cumin Powder - 1/2 tsp Coriander powder - 1/2 tsp Salt - to taste Butter - 3 tb sp Procedure: Stuffing/ Curry:
  • Heat oil on medium to high
  • Add carrot & saute
  • Add chopped capsicum/ green bell pepper & saute
  • Add sweet corn and saute
  • Cook 2 mins
  • Add mint leaves
  • Add spices & salt
  • Mix well
  • Sweet corn stuffing is ready
Stuffing Puffs :
  • Take one puff pastry sheets
  • Cut into 3 equal vertical pieces
  • Keep sweet corn stuffing on it
  • Close the sides & edges perfectly
  • Gently press the sides with fork
  • Apply butter on puffs
  • Apply butter on baking tray
  • Arrange puffs in baking tray
  • Pre heat 200 C/ 400 F 5 minutes
  • Bake 180 C/350 F Â 25 minutes
  • Take out when it becomes light brown, flaky & puffs up
  • Sweet Corn ðŸŒ½Â puffs is ready
  • Serve it hot with tomato sauce
